{"step_by_step_thinking": "The World Health Organization (WHO) 2016 classification of Acute leukemia includes several provisional entities. These are categories that are still under investigation and may be officially recognized in the future. AML with BCR - ABL, ALL with BCR - ABL like mutation, and Early T - cell precursor leukemia / Lymphoma are all provisional entities in the WHO 2016 classification. However, AML with hyperploidy is not listed as a provisional entity in this classification.", "answer_choice": "A"}
